results.title: Efficacy and Safety of Adjunctive Aripiprazole, Metformin, and Paeoniae-Glycyrrhiza Decoction for Antipsychotic-Induced Hyperprolactinemia: A Network Meta-Analysis of Randomized Controlled Trials
results.text_hl: Consequently, alternative treatments, such as adjunctive @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and paeoniae-glycyrrhiza decoction (PGD), have been trialed for AP-induced @<m>DISEASE_Hyperprolactinemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006966 @@@HPRL@@@.

results.title: Metformin usage in the treatment of risperidone induced hyperprolactinemia in an adolescent patient with bipolar disorder type 1: a case report.
results.text_hl: Although there are studies showing that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ can be used in the treatment of @<m>DISEASE_Hyperprolactinemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006966 @@@hyperprolactinaemia@@@, as far as we know, there are not enough studies on the use of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in adolescents.

citations.NLM: Topkaya E, Bilal Karakuş O. Metformin usage in the treatment of risperidone induced hyperprolactinemia in an adolescent patient with bipolar disorder type 1: a case report. Int J Psychiatry Clin Pract. 2025 Sep 17;():1-3. PMID: 40961367
